rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area with Vastu-compliant south-east corner placement
Adjacent dining space integrated with the living room for seamless flow
Functional kitchen in north-west corner ensuring proper Vastu and ventilation
Master bedroom with private balcony facing the east (positive energy)
Second bedroom with adjacent balcony facing the west (balance and harmony)
Third bedroom with a small balcony oriented towards north (stability)
Dedicated home office space placed in the northeast for concentration and creativity
Primary washroom near common areas, with Vastu alignment to the south-west

openings.description: Main entrance placed in north for auspicious entry
Large windows on east side to allow early morning sunlight in living and bedrooms
Each bedroom has a balcony with secure railings
